description: This is a C# source file defining a database migration for Entity Framework Core, creating tables for Users, FriendRequests, and Messages, along with their relationships and indexes.

classes.name: _0001_Initial
classes.description: Represents a database migration for initializing the schema with Users, FriendRequests, and Messages tables, including their constraints and indexes.

methods.name: Up
methods.description: Defines the operations to apply the migration, creating tables, constraints, and indexes.

methods.name: Down
methods.description: Defines the operations to revert the migration, dropping the tables.
